summary: Simplified Audio Caller feature testing complete. All backend APIs and frontend UI working correctly. CreateUserGame Audio mode hides date/time fields (auto-fills them), AudioCaller page has large Pause button, Manual Call, Reset, End buttons. POST /api/user-games/{id}/reset endpoint clears called_numbers and keeps game live.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/user-games creates audio game with audio_only=true
Backend: Audio game auto-fills date/time (frontend sends current date/time)
Backend: call_interval defaults to 8 seconds
Backend: POST /api/user-games/{id}/start starts game
Backend: POST /api/user-games/{id}/call-number calls next number
Backend: POST /api/user-games/{id}/reset clears called_numbers
Backend: Reset keeps game status as 'live'
Backend: Reset sets current_number to null
Backend: Can call numbers after reset
Backend: POST /api/user-games/{id}/end ends game
Backend: Reset requires authentication (401 without token)
Backend: Reset only allowed by host (403 for non-host)
Frontend: CreateUserGame shows two game modes (Digital Tickets and Audio Caller)
Frontend: Audio mode HIDES Date and Time fields
Frontend: Audio mode shows Auto-Call Settings with Call Interval input
Frontend: Audio mode shows Game Name as optional
Frontend: Creating audio game navigates to /audio-caller/{userGameId}
Frontend: AudioCaller shows Start Game button when game is upcoming
Frontend: AudioCaller shows large PAUSE/RESUME button (h-24) when game is live
Frontend: AudioCaller shows Manual Call, Reset, End buttons in secondary row
Frontend: Reset button clears called numbers and shows 'Game reset!' toast
Frontend: Number board shows 1-90 with called numbers highlighted
Frontend: Current ball display shows number with call name
seed_data_creation: Created test user and session for authenticated testing. Created multiple test audio games for testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Simplified Audio Caller feature fully tested. Key changes: 1) Audio mode in CreateUserGame hides date/time fields - they are auto-filled with current date/time, 2) AudioCaller page has large PAUSE/RESUME button (h-24 class), 3) Secondary controls row: Manual Call, Reset, End buttons, 4) POST /api/user-games/{id}/reset clears called_numbers, sets current_number to null, keeps status as 'live'. Auto-call starts immediately when Start Game is clicked.
